data.title: Daily Belt - Cognac

Description.Para: The Standard Belt emphasizes utilitarian styling and is built to last and improve with age. Featuring a matching leather keep and metal hardware, the edges are dyed, burnished, waxed, and each belt is stamped with our signature makers mark.

data.Sizing_Info: Our belts are designed to be worn using the middle hole on the tail. The space between each hole is 1” so you can adjust as needed. It's always best to measure your waist where your pants sit but we have a free and easy exchange program so you can order with confidence if you're not 100% certain of your size.
Returns_Exchange: Tanner Goods | Mazama gladly accepts returns for refund, exchange, or store credit on unused, qualifying items within 30 days of receiving your purchase. Monogrammed items, final sale, and sample sale goods will not be eligible for returns and exchanges.
If you'd like to make a return, just head over to our Returns Center and have your order number or email address handy.

If you'd like to make a return, just head over to our Returns Center and have your order number or email address handy.

data.title: Utility Bifold - Cognac

Description.Para: Constructed from 3.5oz. Natural tooling leather, our Utility Bifold features four card-slot pockets, two hidden pockets, and one lengthwise pocket for bills. Each wallet is burnished, dyed, waxed, and stamped with our signature maker's mark.

Returns_Exchange: Tanner Goods | Mazama gladly accepts returns for refund, exchange, or store credit on unused, qualifying items within 30 days of receiving your purchase. Monogrammed items, final sale, and sample sale goods will not be eligible for returns and exchanges.
If you'd like to make a return, just head over to our Returns Center and have your order number or email address handy.

wallet.title: Minimal Cardholder - Carbon

Description.Para: Constructed from 3.5oz. Natural tooling leather, our Utility Bifold features four card-slot pockets, two hidden pockets, and one lengthwise pocket for bills. Each wallet is burnished, dyed, waxed, and stamped with our signature maker's mark.Cut from one lightweight piece of 3oz Skirting leather, the wear characteristics are similar to Natural Tooling, so it will patina to your personal journey. The Card Holder features one central pocket with an angled card slot cut into the leather.

Returns_Exchange: Tanner Goods | Mazama gladly accepts returns for refund, exchange, or store credit on unused, qualifying items within 30 days of receiving your purchase. Monogrammed items, final sale, and sample sale goods will not be eligible for returns and exchanges.

tableware.title: Small Mug

tableware.title: Carafe

Description.Para: Hand blown from durable soda-lime glass, our Carafe is a versatile serving vessel for any occasion. Featuring a wide mouth opening, it’s also perfect for adding ice into a lemonade or mixed drink and easy to stir with a spoon if you wish. Topped off with a beautiful natural oak wood ball stopper, our Carafe is practical as well as beautiful.
